visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: 'Monthly Data Trends', Axes and labels styling: X-axis labels should be in blue color with a font size of 12px, Y-axis labels should be in green color with a font size of 14px, Data series: Series 1 should have the name 'Sales' and data [10, 15, 13, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, 50, 55, 60], Series 2 should have the name 'Expenses' and data [5, 7, 6, 10, 12, 15, 18, 20, 22, 25, 28, 30], Custom colors: Series 1 color should be #FF5733, Series 2 color should be #33FF57, Additional configurations: Chart background should be light gray, legend should be positioned at the bottom of the chart, and chart margins should be set to 50px for top and bottom, and 100px for left and right.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Data Trends'. The X-axis labels are styled in blue with a font size of 12px, and the Y-axis labels are styled in green with a font size of 14px. The chart includes two data series: 'Sales' with data [10, 15, 13, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, 50, 55, 60] and 'Expenses' with data [5, 7, 6, 10, 12, 15, 18, 20, 22, 25, 28, 30]. The 'Sales' series is colored #FF5733 and the 'Expenses' series is colored #33FF57. The chart background is set to light gray, and the legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart. The chart margins are adjusted to 50px for the top and bottom, and 100px for the left and right, providing ample space around the chart.
